title: Bellator Europe 5 live results (5 p.m. ET)
text:
Bellator Europe 5 takes place Saturday in Italy, and you can join us for live results of all of the action.

Bellator Europe 5 takes place at Allianz Cloud in Milan and streams on the Bellator app.

In the main event, Dutch knockout artist Melvin Manhoef (31-14-1 MMA, 3-3 BMMA) takes on powerful Englishman Yannick Bahati (9-4 MMA, 0-1 BMMA) in a light heavyweight bout.

Bellator 230 follows later on Saturday, airing simultaneously on Paramount and DAZN at 9 p.m. ET via tape delay.

Enjoy the fights, everyone.

The Bellator Europe 5 lineup includes:
